trans-unit.source: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.
trans-unit.target: 若持續性提供者預期執行個體應處於未初始化狀態，但執行個體卻不是處於該狀態時，就會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.
trans-unit.target: 若持續性提供者預期執行個體應處於未初始化狀態，但執行個體卻不是處於該狀態時，就會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況的原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class using the error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The information about the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 目前例外狀況的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況的原因。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class using the error message and the inner exception information.
trans-unit.target: 使用錯誤訊息和內部例外狀況訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a result of a previous exception typically includes a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若例外狀況是因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的結果，其 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A> 屬性中通常會包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令的 XName (命名空間和名稱的結合)。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 目標執行個體的 ID (命令會針對這個執行個體執行)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command and the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用命令的 XName (命名空間和名稱的結合) 與目標執行個體的 ID (針對這個執行個體的執行命令會當做參數傳遞)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令的 XName (命名空間和名稱的結合)。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 目標執行個體的 ID (命令會針對這個執行個體執行)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, and the inner exception information.
trans-unit.target: 使用命令的 XName (命名空間和名稱的結合)、目標執行個體的 ID (命令會針對這個執行個體執行)，以及內部例外狀況資訊初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令的 XName (命名空間和名稱的結合)。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 目標執行個體的 ID (命令會針對這個執行個體執行)。

trans-unit.source: The reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況的原因。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the error message that explains the reason for the current exception, and the inner exception information passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用命令的 XName (命名空間和名稱的結合)、目標執行個體 ID (命令是針對這個執行個體執行的)、說明目前例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息，以及傳遞做為參數的內部例外狀況資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceCollisionException" /> 類別的執行個體。
